entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
